name: MySmoothies
0:
”Alexa, ask My Smoothies to tell me a smoothie with mango”
”Banana smoothie”
”Smoothie with orange”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my smoothies
des:
You just need to say one fruit from your smoothie recipe and alexa will tell you a recipe where that fruit is primary. 
For example you can say "mango smoothie" and alexa will tell you a smoothie recipe with mango and other ingredients.

The list of smoothies and fruits will grow in the future as more recipes will be added to the skin.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
